title: This Lecture â€“ Agenda

definitions.Chain-of-Thought: A logical sequence of thoughts or steps to reach a conclusion.
definitions.Zero-shot reasoner: A type of AI model that can reason without prior examples.
definitions.Few-shot reasoner: A type of AI model that requires a few examples to reason.

summary: The lecture agenda includes topics on reasoning basics, chain-of-thought, zero-shot and few-shot reasoners, analogical reasoning, multimodal reasoning, multimodal chain-of-thought, commonsense knowledge, and reasoning benchmarks.
